thread.title: Stranger Things’ Millie Bobby Brown to star in Godzilla: King of the Monsters
thread.title_full: Stranger Things’ Millie Bobby Brown to star in Godzilla: King of the Monsters

author: Alex Young
title: Stranger Things’ Millie Bobby Brown to star in Godzilla: King of the Monsters
text:
Following her breakout performance as Eleven in Netflix’s Stranger Things , Millie Bobby Brown has landed her first role in a feature film. And it’s a big one — a monster of a role, in fact.
According to The Hollywood Reporter , Brown will star in the forthcoming blockbuster Godzilla: King of the Monsters . The film, which is being directed by Michael Dougherty ( Krampus ) serves as the third installment in Legendary Pictures’s MonsterVerse following 2014’s Godzilla and the forthcoming Kong: Skull Island .
Godzilla: King of the Monsters is set to hit theaters on March 22nd, 2019.
